column4: I've installed "lm-sensors" package and when I type "sudo sensors-detect" I get: No i2c device files found. Use prog/mkdev/mkdev.sh to create them.
But I dont have mkdev.sh nor would I know what to do with it.Can someone please give me some advice ?
I've installed "lm-sensors" package and when I type "sudo sensors-detect" I get: No i2c device files found. Use prog/mkdev/mkdev.sh to create them.
But I dont have mkdev.sh nor would I know what to do with it.Can someone please give me some advice ?

because its LTS and Edgy is coming with 2.16.
Uh, but when will it come :(
And can I upgrade from 6.06 to 6.10 without too much hustle?
yes, eventually; don't try it now as its still being worked on and has a few bugs.
means its supported for longer than the other releases, not that it will update to the latest and greatest.
